client.apis.v1.tests.test_capital_open_approval_detail 源代码

# -*- coding: UTF-8 -*-
"""
@Summary : 测试资金机构查询x信详情
@Author  : Rey
@Time    : 2022-03-11 14:32:14
@Run     : python manage.py test client.apis.v1.tests.test_capital_open_approval_detail  -v=3 --keepdb
"""
from rest_framework import status
from rest_framework.test import APITestCase

from client.apis.v1.tests.base import create_user, action_cache
from utils.jwt_util import user_info_2_token



[文档]class CapitalOpenApprovalDetail(APITestCase):
    """
    测试资金机构查询x信详情
    python manage.py test client.apis.v1.tests.test_capital_open_approval_detail.CapitalOpenApprovalDetail  -v=3 --keepdb
    """
    databases = {'default', 'credible_data'}
    fixtures = [
        'const_company.json', 'const_credit.json', 'location.json', 'business.json', 'work_flow.json',
        'company.json', 'capital_open_approval_list.json', 'const_platform.json'
    ]


[文档]    @action_cache
    def client_request(self, uid: int, company_uid: str, cc_id: int, **kwargs):
        """封装请求"""
        create_user(uid)
        base_url = '/api/v1/scf/client/capital/credit_certificates/{}/'
        token = user_info_2_token({'user_id': uid})
        self.client.credentials(HTTP_AUTHORIZATION=f'Bear {bytes.decode(token)}')
        return self.client.get(
            base_url.format(cc_id), kwargs, format='json', HTTP_ELAB_COMPANY=company_uid
        )



[文档]    def test_success_no_enslosure(self):
        """测试成功: 没有附件"""
        resp = self.client_request(uid=2, company_uid='nLT5cTjGxFGLjNfmFhKnYw', cc_id=1)
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_200_OK)
        data = resp_json['data']

        self.assertEqual(len(data['object']['enclosures']), 0)
        self.assertEqual(data['object']['total_contract_amount'], '0.00')



[文档]    def test_success_one_enslosure(self):
        """测试成功: 一个附件"""
        resp = self.client_request(uid=2, company_uid='nLT5cTjGxFGLjNfmFhKnYw', cc_id=2)
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        data = resp_json['data']

        self.assertEqual(len(data['object']['enclosures']), 1)
        self.assertEqual(data['object']['total_contract_amount'], '66.00')

    

[文档]    def test_success_two_enslosure(self):
        """测试成功: 两个附件"""
        resp = self.client_request(uid=2, company_uid='nLT5cTjGxFGLjNfmFhKnYw', cc_id=3)
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()
        data = resp_json['data']

        self.assertEqual(len(data['object']['enclosures']), 2)
        self.assertEqual(data['object']['total_contract_amount'], '132.66')



[文档]    def test_404(self):
        """测试记录不存在"""
        resp = self.client_request(uid=2, company_uid='nLT5cTjGxFGLjNfmFhKnYw', cc_id=2000)
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()

        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'not found')
        self.assertIsNone(resp_json['data'])



[文档]    def test_is_not_reviewed_and_future(self):
        """测试未被当前节点审批过且未到当前节点审批"""
        resp = self.client_request(uid=2, company_uid='nLT5cTjGxFGLjNfmFhKnYw', cc_id=4)
        self.assertEqual(resp.status_code, status.HTTP_200_OK)
        resp_json = resp.json()

        self.assertEqual(resp_json['code'], status.HTTP_500_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR)
        self.assertEqual(resp_json['msg'], 'not found')
        self.assertIsNone(resp_json['data'])
